description: MCP server for encrypted SQLite databases (SQLCipher 4) - Works with MoneyMoney, KeePass and more

environmentVariables.name: DB_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to the encrypted SQLite database file (inside container: /data/database.sqlite)

environmentVariables.name: DB_PASSPHRASE
environmentVariables.description: Passphrase for decrypting the database (or use encrypted: prefix for encrypted passphrases)
